text: 4 Gal 2.4, Tat 1.16, Hib 12.15, 2 Pi 2.1, 1 Jo 2.22 God bɨlel agak, Binɨb anɨb ak tek gɨnɨgabal okok, kɨlop ag gɨl yul awl yɨbɨl ñɨnɨgayn agak. Binɨb God nop anɨgɨl gɨ tɨmel gɨpal okok, ogɨnap kɨmɨgel apɨl nɨb ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdebɨm. God chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup ak pen, kɨli anɨb ak tɨg adɨkɨl, tap si tap tɨmel okok monmon yɨbɨl gɨpal. Pen kɨli Bɨawl chɨn nokom yɨbɨl Jisas Klays nop kud ñɨl kelɨgɨpal.
